lexUnit.name: comprehension.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the action or capability of understanding.

sentence.text: Why , then , have the majority of studies of normal adult language processing been concerned with language comprehension ?
The main question which was posed was whether semantic ( and pragmatic ) constraints could affect the amount of syntactic processing which was carried out in sentence comprehension .
In a number of theories of text comprehension , such mappings are assumed to be made ( potentially ) at a number of levels .
Since Broca 's pioneering work , a variety of studies have confirmed that the left hemisphere plays a dominant role in the comprehension and expression of written and spoken language .
He was quite fluent but seemed to read without comprehension .
The main aim of the research is to examine the interrelationship between the comprehension and production of early vocabulary .
Beyond speech now , she nodded her comprehension .
To improve matters our electronic Frankenstein monster needs better peripherals for expression , and internals for ` add-ins " to aid its comprehension .
Our comprehension , however , based as it is on observation , intuition , and guesswork is always only partial .
The stuff Rufus wanted to know would be beyond the average reader 's comprehension .
The reader can judge for himself whether his comprehension would have been fuller if he had known this topic .
The tolerance and friendly hospitality that greets me everywhere baffles my comprehension .
Perhaps television will eventually lead to better public comprehension of that much misunderstood institution of Parliament .
These knowledge sources are essential to the comprehension of all but the simplest discourse , and hence present a considerable acquisition problem for computers .
The second part describes communication by speakers or writers and comprehension by listeners or readers .
Only the experience or the comprehension of this life allows the true understanding of unofficial Russian art . "
No doubts existed as to our comprehension of it .
After all , learning suggests to most of us some degree of understanding , some conscious comprehension of the problem to be solved .
In cases of conduction aphasia , comprehension of spoken words and simple spoken sentences can be intact .
No man can comprehend the things of God : if there is to be any comprehension on our part , then the onus is on God to reveal himself .

There was lack of comprehension at how it could have happened and why the 63th Army could not have been relieved , and little consolation for bereaved relatives in the official interpretation of ` heroic sacrifice " .

Does he accept that not only that youth 's family but many other people have a total lack of comprehension as to how someone could be hanged in this country when he was in police custody when the gun was fired and the unfortunate police officer was killed by another person ?
There was also disappointment that no immediate action had followed such strong words , and lack of comprehension that Hitler needed any further powers to be granted .
